title: Queen Elizabeth II statue will be standing and not on horseback
description: The national memorial to the late Queen Elizabeth in St James's Park will not show her riding a horse as previously illustrated.
content:
The national monument to the late Queen Elizabeth II will feature a statue of her standing, rather than on horseback as previously illustrated, the memorial committee has announced.
The memorial, including three statues and a tiara-shaped glass balus... [2097 chars]

title: TikTok closes deal with White House to split US app from global business
description: Trump had threatened to ban the app in the US if its Chinese owner had not divested its business in America.
content:
American TikTok may not have the same feel as the global app
Suranjana Tewari
Asia Business Correspondent
The announcement confirms a big change to how TikTok's algorithm will work in the US.
It will be run separately from the global app and will be ... [5336 chars]

title: Supersized illegal waste dumps hidden across English countryside
description: A BBC investigation uncovers how criminals are operating huge illegal rubbish tips across the country.
content:
Hundreds of illegal dumps are operating across England, including at least 11 so-called "super sites" containing tens of thousands of tonnes of rubbish, a BBC investigation has found.
More than 700 illegal tips were shut down in 2024/25, but data rel... [8021 chars]

title: Japan pauses restart of world’s largest nuclear power plant one day after it went online
description: Operator says it does not know when the problem at the Kashiwazaki-Kariwa plant in Niigata province will be solved, after an alarm sounded during start-up
content:
The restart of the world’s largest nuclear power plant was suspended in Japan on Thursday just a day after it went online for the first time in about 14 years, with the operator saying it does not know when the problem will be solved.
The Kashiwazaki... [2237 chars]

title: Help 2: Behind the scenes as Olivia Rodrigo, Pulp and Arctic Monkeys record charity album
description: Olivia Rodrigo, Arctic Monkeys and Pulp are among the artists who recorded new songs for War Child.
content:
Damon Albarn is standing in the doorway of Abbey Road's canteen, deep in conversation with The Libertines' Carl Barat.
Nearby, Pulp are queueing for a fresh batch of lasagne.
Around them, half a dozen of children are running around, filming everythin... [4825 chars]
